movie_desc_1: Newly single LA hotshot Amanda and heartbroken London journalist Iris impulsively swap houses for two weeks over Christmas to escape their romantic woes
movie_desc_2: A barista discovers her secret royal lineage after a Christmas cookie contest
stars: Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jude Law, and Jack Black

movie_desc_1: After discovering their significant others are siblings, two resentful exes must spend Christmas under one roof — while hiding their romantic history.
movie_desc_2: A corporate lawyer inherits a failing cranberry bog in Vermont, and discovers the true meaning of the holidays.
stars: Lindsay Lohan

movie_desc_1: An old flame resurfaces when Mia's grandmother decides to sell the family windmill.
movie_desc_2: A retired ballet dancer must save the Sugarplum Valley reindeer parade after the mayor sprains his ankle.
stars: nobody I have ever heard of

movie_desc_1: When a snowstorm strands an archaeologist in a gingerbread-themed B&B...
movie_desc_2: Small town boutique owner Bella has an aristocratic new client...
stars: Danica McKellar

movie_desc_1: A talented photographer stuck in a dead-end job inherits an antique Advent calendar that may be predicting the future - and pointing her toward love.
movie_desc_2: Assigned to cover the Winter Lights Festival in Cozy Pines, Alaska, a jaded meteorologist finds herself predicting love instead of snowstorms…
stars: Kat Graham and Quincy Brown

movie_desc_1: A young elf mistakes a tiny alien for a Christmas gift, not knowing her new plaything has plans to destroy Earth's gravity — and steal all the presents.
movie_desc_2: Disgraced figure skater Bella moves to a snowy mountain village to coach the local hockey team—and finds herself drawn to its rugged captain, Liam.
stars: a number of voice actors. It's an animation film

movie_desc_1: When her Christmas cruise ship gets stuck in the Arctic Circle, free-spirited Penny falls for a grumpy scientist who's studying polar bears.
movie_desc_2: When a young widow's magic scarf brings a dashing snowman to life, can he help her rediscover romance, laughter and holiday cheer before he melts away?
stars: Lacey Chabert and Dustin Milligan

movie_desc_1: A former veterinarian turned wreath-maker rescues a runaway reindeer—and ends up stuck hosting a live nativity with the town's least festive mechanic
movie_desc_2: To save her parents' small-town nightclub, a Broadway dancer stages an all-male, Christmas-themed revue — and meets a guy with all the right moves.
stars: Britt Robertson and Chad Michael Murray

movie_desc_1: Despite working as an elf, Kate doesn't believe in the magic of Christmas. Everything changes when she meets Tom, who brings faith back into her life.
movie_desc_2: When a department store Santa calls in sick, a gruff retired wrestler reluctantly steps into the role—and ends up inspiring the whole town.
stars: Emilia Clarke, Henry Golding, Emma Thompson, Michelle Yeoh, and the songs of George Michael

movie_desc_1: An archaeologist is sent to excavate a rare Christmas artifact in the deserts of Egypt, but the cheerful local guide might hold the key to unlocking its holiday magic.
movie_desc_2: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven at Christmas - forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival.
stars: Ella Hunt, Malcolm Cumming, and Sarah Swire

movie_desc_1: Meteorologist and part-time professor Ethan and his wife Addison, a TV news reporter, must come together to help save others and rescue their missing children when a tornado levels their town on Christmas Eve.
movie_desc_2: A workaholic event planner is sent to organize a tropical Christmas party in Hawaii, but the laid-back surfer helping her decorate has his own ideas about holiday traditions.
stars: Casper Van Dien. Yes. The guy from Starship Troopers. I couldn't believe it either.

movie_desc_1: When a spoiled rich kid hires a hitman to take out Santa Claus, the grizzled and world-weary Chris Cringle must fight back with everything he's got to protect Christmas.
movie_desc_2: A secret agent on a mission to stop a holiday heist ends up undercover as Santa in a mall filled with unsuspecting hostages—and one surprisingly resourceful elf.
stars: Mel Gibson and the amazing Marianne Jean-Baptiste

movie_desc_1: When a jaded barista finds a love letter hidden in a Christmas brew order, she sets out across the city to reunite two strangers—only to fall for both of them along the way.
movie_desc_2: After being released from jail, trans sex worker Sin-Dee and her pal Alexandra storm the streets of LA to get revenge on her fickle boyfriend
stars: Kitana Kiki Rodriguez and Mya Taylor

movie_desc_1: When a stressed-out dentist agrees to host her small town's gingerbread house competition, she finds herself caught in a sugary feud between two rival bakers with decades of holiday drama.
movie_desc_2: Peter asks his best friend to pose as his boyfriend on a Christmas visit home, but their plan — and feelings — change when his family plays matchmaker.
stars: Michael Urie, Philemon Chambers, and Jennifer Coolidge

movie_desc_1: A New York City cop faces overwhelming odds when his Christmas visit to California is interrupted by a terrorist invasion of his estranged wife's office building.
movie_desc_2: A retired Navy SEAL is forced to suit up one last time when his quiet mountain cabin Christmas is interrupted by a team of mercenaries hunting for hidden gold.
stars: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, and Bonnie Bedelia

movie_desc_1: A no-nonsense department store manager hires a down-on-his-luck pianist to play carols during the holiday rush, sparking a romance that proves miracles can happen—even between the aisles.
movie_desc_2: On Christmas Eve, a discouraged banker is shown by his guardian angel how the world would look without him—reminding him of life's true worth and the power of kindness.
stars: James Stewart and Donna Reed

movie_desc_1: Two bickering clerks wage a running battle of words, unaware that they have become romantic pen pals.
movie_desc_2: After losing her job as a typist on Christmas Eve, a plucky young woman is mistaken for a wealthy socialite at a glamorous holiday ball, where she must juggle charm, champagne, and the truth before the clock strikes midnight.
stars: James Stewart and Margaret Sullivan

movie_desc_1: A gruff landlord threatens to evict a group of quirky tenants on Christmas Eve, but their efforts to change his mind—and his heart—might just bring about a holiday miracle.
movie_desc_2: When an elderly department store Santa Claus is declared insane and put on trial, everyone's faith is put to the test as old and young alike face the age old question: Do you believe in Santa Claus?
stars: Edmund Gwenn, Maureen O'Hara, and John Payne

movie_desc_1: After Santa Claus is arrested and jailed, a recently paroled prisoner and his young son attempt to save Christmas before it's too late.
movie_desc_2: After a runaway reindeer crashes into her family’s narrowboat, a plucky young girl must navigate snowy canals and unlikely friendships to get him back to Santa in time for Christmas Eve.
stars: Jim Broadbent, Rafe Spall, and Kit Connor

movie_desc_1: When a small town's Christmas tree is cut down from the forbidden forest, something ancient and vengeful begins to stalk the town's merrymakers one by one.
movie_desc_2: Young Max dreads his Yuletide getting much worse following the arrival of his redneck cousins. However, his disillusionment inadvertently summons the Krampus, the demonically dark alter-ego of St Nicholas, who lays siege to the holiday home aided by his spiteful acolytes.
stars: Adam Scott, Toni Collette

movie_desc_1: An imaginary world comes to life in a sugarrush of steampunk joy in this story about an eccentric toymaker, his adventurous granddaughter, and a magical invention that has the power to change their lives forever.
movie_desc_2: When two siblings find an ancient key in their grandmother’s attic, it unlocks a hidden world of forgotten Christmas toys—who need their help to save the holiday before the clock strikes midnight.
stars: Forest Whitaker, Keegan-Michael Key, and Madalen Mills

movie_desc_1: After a group of hackers shuts down the power grid on Christmas Eve, a tech-savvy teen and her estranged father — a former cyber-crime agent — must work together to stop the mastermind behind the chaos.
movie_desc_2: When a small-town mum with amnesia agrees to be in the town's Christmas parade, her face on TV draws assassins to her door and she's thrown back into her deadly past as a CIA assassin in this high-octane fight for survival over the holidays, complete with explosions and a very sharp knife.
stars: Geena Davis and Samuel L. Jackson

movie_desc_1: A Christmas family reunion quickly turns into a web of secrets, lies, and murder when a famous crime novelist is found dead and a mysterious private detective shows up to investigate alongside the police.
movie_desc_2: A Christmas Eve wedding is marred by murder, and a former detective must untangle the bride’s complicated family history to catch the killer before they escape into the snowy night.
stars: an ensemble cast including Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Jamie Lee Curtis, Toni Collette, Don Johnson, and Ana de Armas

movie_desc_1: A clumsy choirboy discovers his voice with the help of a grumpy old organist and a mischievous talking robin who's determined to save the village's Christmas concert.
movie_desc_2: Santa's daughter must take over the family business when her father retires and her brother, who is supposed to inherit the Santa role, gets cold feet.
stars: Anna Kendrick, Shirley MacLaine, and Bill Hader

movie_desc_1: A matchmaking grandmother schemes to bring her workaholic granddaughter home for Christmas, where a handsome farmer and a runaway cow complicate her perfectly laid plans.
movie_desc_2: When her husband abruptly ends their marriage, empty nester Kate embarks on a solo second honeymoon in Africa, finding purpose - and potential romance with an elephant conservationist.
stars: Kristin Davis and Rob Lowe,

movie_desc_1: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.
movie_desc_2: A remote toy factory’s night shift turns into a nightmare when the toys come to life—and they’re not playing nice.
stars: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, and Hoyt Axton
